about_the_game:
■Information

■Synopsis
World fighting tournament.
It is a martial arts festival to determine the strongest person in this world.
Honor is given to those who win, and it is a stage that every aspiring warrior dreams of at least once.
People who have made a name for themselves in various fields announce their participation in the large-scale tournament held in the country designated as the host venue, but some of the participants include Agent Hina of the World Police Organization and others in the underworld. There were also people who had their own problems, such as Cecil, an assassin who was rumored to be a powerful assassin. Meanwhile, Gennosuke, a young man attending martial arts academy, reluctantly enters the World Fighting Tournament at the insistence of his homeroom teacher.

■basic operation
　　A button:・・・Punch ① button
　　B button・・・Kick ① button
　　C button・・・Punch ② button
　　D button・・・Kick ② button
　　SP button・・・special move button
　　DA button・・・ Dash button
　　SA button・・・super special move button
　　TH button・・・Throw button
START button・・・Start button

■Controller setting method (Options ⇒ Input Settings ⇒ Keyboard or Controller config)
Up・・・↑
Down・・・↓
LEFT・・・←
RIGHT・・・→
　　A・・・A button
　　C・・・C button
　　SP・・・SP button
　　B・・・B button
　　D・・・D button
　　DA・・・DA button
START・・・START button
　　SA・・・SA button
　　TH・・・TH button
MENU・・・MENU/BACK button
※If you are having trouble with the button settings, please try disabling STEAM input.

■ Description of the battle system
[N mode]
① Dash & back step & EX special moves can be used
② Possible to pass through throws
③ Equipped with parry (last minute guard) & guard crush system
④Guard cancel & parry cancel can be used
⑤ CA can be used when in trigger state

[A mode] *Characters with A in front of their character names are applicable.
① EX special moves can be used
② Possible to pass through throws
③ Equipped with parry (last minute guard) & guard crush system
④Guard cancel & parry cancel can be used
⑤ Dash & Backstep & CA can be used when in trigger state
⑥ Trigger activation is possible by canceling part of the normal move

■About online match
You can also play online with Steam Remote Play Together.

■Notes
・This game is a test work.
・Please use at your own risk

■Information

■Synopsis
World fighting tournament.
It is a martial arts festival to determine the strongest person in this world.
Honor is given to those who win, and it is a stage that every aspiring warrior dreams of at least once.
People who have made a name for themselves in various fields announce their participation in the large-scale tournament held in the country designated as the host venue, but some of the participants include Agent Hina of the World Police Organization and others in the underworld. There were also people who had their own problems, such as Cecil, an assassin who was rumored to be a powerful assassin. name: SUPER FIGHTING HEROES
short_description: ◆What is SUPER FIGHTING HEROES? This is a fighting game where you can enjoy high-speed tactics.
